name: Interpretation and Presentation of Heritage Sites
content: IPHS, Malta 2017 welcomes contributions from curators, managers and practitioners representing different cultural and technical perspectives. This event will feature an introduction to the new field of Archaeoacoustics and consideration of Soundscapes. The conference program will include selected peer-reviewed individual papers and poster sessions as well as an anticipated satellite program of events. Presentations and subsequent publications will be in English. 250-300 word abstracts of papers, presentations and posters should be submitted in English, in either Text, Word or PDF formats. The DEADLINE for submissions is September 30, 2016\. Submitters will be informed before January 2017\. Email to: IPHS@OTSF.org
organizers: The OTS Foundation, Heritage Malta, ICOMOS ICIP
